title: 27: OBITCH she's alive...
description:
Obitch! This week we’ve got everything from skin shoes to coming back from the dead! We’ve got a sweet obituary for a funny lady, and one for a man of many names, some dumb.ass.criminals. and so much more! 
Follow us: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
Green Chef: Visit Greenchef.com/obit10 for 10 free meals + free shipping! 
BetterHelp: Visit betterhelp.com/obit for 10% off your first month! 
Storyworth: Visit storyworth.com/obit to save $10 on your first purchase! 
Sources: 
https://www.healthline.com/health/lazarus-syndrome#timing https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/317645#Hypothermia,-catalepsy,-and-locked-in-syndrome https://www.news-medical.net/health/What-is-Lazarus-SyndromeAutoresuscitation.aspx https://www.liquisearch.com/lazarus_syndrome/cases http://www.theglobaldispatch.com/janina-kolkiewicz-91-year-old-woman-dead-for-hours-wakes-up-and-asks-for-food-67381/ https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/in-excess/201704/back-the-dead https://www.thesouthafrican.com/lifestyle/breaking-waking-up-from-the-dead-lazarus-phenomenon-syndrome-possibility/ https://www.newsmax.com/TheWire/janina-kolkiewicz-dead-wakes-up/2014/11/14/id/607509/ https://www.thehealthboard.com/what-is-lazarus-syndrome.htm  https://www.tmj4.com/news/local-news/police-intruder-yells-ho-ho-ho-while-hiding-in-wisconsin-familys-bedroom-closet https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/29816685/james-william-adams https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/dispatch/name/james-ward-obituary?id=28798580 https://cremationsocietyofmn.com/tribute/details/35253/Anita-Holbein/obituary.html https://allthatsinteresting.com/big-nose-george https://www.carboncountymuseum.org/collections/archives https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Nose_George https://www.dailycamera.com/2009/08/14/longmont-man-arrested-in-police-impersonation-porn-case/ See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
